name: Meet Cute: Muscle Rivals
summary: In a whimsical high-fantasy world, two rival elves, Lyssaria and Alen, find themselves locked in a fierce and hilariously petty battle of strength and wit. Both are obsessed with bodybuilding and will stop at nothing to prove they are the strongest elf. Their over-the-top competitions fuel a long-standing rivalry rooted in a laughably trivial incident from their youth. Along the way, they discover that their rivalry might mask a deeper connection, and perhaps, there’s more to their bond than just competition. This light-hearted romantic comedy blends high-stakes adventure with laugh-out-loud moments and a touch of heartwarming romance, as two stubborn elves learn that the greatest strength comes from unity.
